definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_cherry"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="foliage_height">5</field><field name="base_height">7</field><field name="height_variation_a">1</field><field name="height_variation_b">0</field><field name="hanging_leaves_chance">0.166</field><field name="hanging_leaves_extension_chance">0.333</field><field name="corner_hole_chance">0.25</field><field name="bottom_hole_chance">0.25</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents a cherry tree.</comment><value name="dirt"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:ExsominEndlyum</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed under the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:ExsominLog</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:ExsominLeaves</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Cherry trees don't have roots</comment></block></value><value name="branch_count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">2</field><field name="max">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Cherry trees have between 1 and 3 branches.</comment></block></value><value name="branch_length"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">3</field><field name="max">5</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how long each branch will be.</comment></block></value><value name="decorator0"><block type="tree_decorator_attached_to_leaves"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="probability">0.07</field><field name="exclusion_radius_xz">1</field><field name="exclusion_radius_y">0</field><field name="required_empty_blocks">2</field><field name="direction0">DOWN</field><value name="provider"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:ExsominBlintlight</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="105" w="222">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. We try to place 4 trees in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">4</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_surface_water_depth"><field name="depth">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how deep the water can be for the tree to generate. If the value is 0, the tree will never be submerged</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">We check that the tree doesn't generate in the wrong biome</comment><next><block type="placement_block_survival_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Finally, we check if the position is actually valid. Trees should generate only on blocks that support their sapling.</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:ExsominShortgrass</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used to check for the tree position. Generally it should be the sapling of the tree.</comment></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
